channel.title: My guides to easy $ in runescape
channel.description:
Hi this is a guide to some cool ways to make $ on runescape..
This *might* involve some...and alot of clicking if you dont have any $..
[u][b]Requirments[/b][/u]
[ul][li]10 crafting[/li][/ul]
Ok lets get started, The great art of flax. If you have 100k this will be simple, otherwise get to clicking in cammy for 40minutes.
Ok go to a world..any should work (meber) and buy your self 1000 flax (1k)
Now go to lumby bank and bank there. Then downstairs you should find a spining place. Spin all your flax.
Once you have done so, go back to cammy and sell them for 170-200ea and a outcome of 170k-200k. [b]Income[/b] : 70-100k
This is simple..if you want to get 100flax buy 10k and spin and sell for 17-20k you will get 7-10k profit easy. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Requirments[/b]
[ul][li]An idea of merchating[/li] [li]Some $[/li][/ul]
Ok, The art of merchating...this will be a tuff one. What i merchant are whips and seercules. Buy a whip at 1.4mil in a packed world such as 18/2/6/22/144 ect. And sell it for 1.6-1.8mil, You will waist 1.4mil but make 200-400k as an income easy. They sell well to. Now for seercules, get 400k and buy 1 sell it in a packed world for 500-600k. [b]Income[/b] :100-200k. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Requirments[/b]
[ul][li]60 woodcutting[/li] [li]Maybe some $[/li][/ul]
Yews, Great for selling, hard for cutting. Get your self 100 yews and sell for 300-400ea. Dont get past that unless you see some 1 buying. Or you can go to a packed world buy them for 250-270ea and sell 300-400ea. No cutting. [b]Income[/b] : 5k-15k (Not exactly sure) -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Well there you go. My guides. I hope you will like it and make plenty of $ on runescape.

item.title: My guides to easy $ in runescape
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:3, topic:132093”][quote author=Click Here link=topic=183075.msg1664967#msg1664967 date=1186777267]
or just box at duel arena? lol i did 5 minutes ago, won 15m easy
[/quote]

best stats for boxing?[/quote]

I don’t know the exact stats for boxing, but i think your supposed to have good attack, fair strength, and good defence.

@pk4pk wrote:

Hi this is a guide to some cool ways to make $ on runescape…

This might involve some…and alot of clicking if you dont have any $…

Ok lets get started, The great art of flax. If you have 100k this will be simple, otherwise get to clicking in cammy for 40minutes.
